item.title: مواقع المديريات السياحية ل58 ولاية الجزائرية
item.description: As part of the implementation of the digitization process of the sector, in its part related to electronic communication to provide content about the tourism and handicraft sector, the launch of 58 websites in the three languages: Arabic, English and French has been completed for the benefit of the tourism and handicraft directorates of 58 provinces. These websites will enable them to highlight and value the tourism potentials, handicrafts and investment mechanisms according to the specificity of each state, as well as contribute to the promotion and promotion of the local destination by providing and facilitating the access of information for the benefit of citizens, economic dealers and professionals.
